A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Instead of Hoth snow\, they had salt.  Instead of the emperor's throne room\, they has Snope.  So if you liked Empire and Return of the Jedi ta-da.  This is the mesh of both.  Character development was blah and the story went on too long with the lowest starship chase ever.  I'm a Star Wars fan and was not impressed.
